prodNameC: 邦迪斯猴子食道免疫螢光染色套組/玻片
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE MONKEY OESOPHAGUS IFA KITS/SLIDES
ingredientsDesc:
1. Monkey oesophagus sections on 5- or 10-well slides.
Kits only:
2. Two positive control sera (derived from human serum), one giving “chicken wire pemphigus pattern and the other “reticulin like”endomysial pattern on monk oesophagus sections, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted, ready for use.
3. Negative control serum, universally negative for all autoantibodies, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted, ready for use.
4. Phosphate buffered saline (PBS), provided as a 20-fold concentrate in liquid form.
5. Affinity purified sheep anti-human IgG (H&L), (monkey adsorbed) fluorescein conjugate and anti-human IgA fluorescein conjugate, containing 0.099% sodium azide. Prediluted, ready for use.
6. 1% Evans Blue, as an optional counterstain.
7. Blotters.
8. Mounting medium, containing an anti-fading agent (DABCO, 1,4 diazabicyclo [2.2.2] octane).
9. Coverslips.
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 猴子食道切片用來篩檢人類血清中的表皮抗原(intra-epidermal antigens)或基底細胞膜(basement membrane zones)抗體與肌內膜抗體(endomysial antibodies)

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5660 多發性自體抗體免疫試驗系統

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: WARSTOCK ROAD, KINGS HEATH, BIRMINGHAM, B14 4RT, UNITED KINGDOM
